entries.journal_entry_description: You have been asked to help bring justice to those who kidnapped the child of a wealthy land owner on Rori.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: An associate of Wernell's in the Narmle Militia can obtain the locations for Vladlun Travan and Jurgen Nath, but asks a favor in return. Reactivate the security terminals throughout Narmle. You must activate at least 9 of them.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Travel to the bunker where Jurgen Nath is living and defeat him.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Travel to the bunker where Vladlun Travan has made his lair. Defeat him and his henchmen.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Defeat Vladlun Travan and his Gang
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Wernell Covington and let him know of your success.
